name: Srcset
tagline: JavaScript Widget to implement src attribute of element.
body: srcset Widget ============= JavaScript Widget to implement srcset attribute of <img> element. srcset allows you to specify a list of alternative sources for an img element. This allows the browser to match an image to the screen properties, producing a responsive image. Currently, this is limited to screen width. The next version will include screen resolution, once I work out the most practical way to do this cross-browser. Usage ----- In your HTML img element, add a src attribute as follows: ```html ``` In principal, supporting browsers should ignore the original src attribute, which is repeated in the srcset attribute.
